sentence.Network_en: The rain dripped monotonously from the trees.
sentence.Network_cn: 雨水从树上滴滴答答地落下。

sentence.Network_en: The maid, still in tears, sniffed monotonously.
sentence.Network_cn: 侍女还在哭, 发出单调的抽泣声.

entry.tran: 单调乏味的;毫无变化的
entry.def: Something that is monotonous is very boring because it has a regular, repeated pattern which never changes.

example.ex: It's monotonous work, like most factory jobs...
example.tran: 与工厂大部分工作一样，这份工作也很单调乏味。

example.ex: The food may get a bit monotonous, but there'll be enough of it.
example.tran: 饭菜可能会有些单一，但管够。

sentences.sentence: "the history of the play throughout the latter part of the eighteenth century is monotonously uneventful"

auth_sentence.content: On Saturday he thrust out his performance rather monotonously, though his vocal steadiness was welcome.
auth_sentence.res_content: On Saturday he thrust out his performance rather monotonously, though his vocal steadiness was welcome.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On Saturday he thrust out his performance rather monotonously, though his vocal steadiness was welcome.

auth_sentence.content: She became a gray sky, stared monotonously at the walls, sometimes wept into her hands for hours at a time.
